name: backstage-plugin-qeta (drodil)
description: [项目级] Internal Q&A and knowledge base for Backstage. Empower teams to share knowledge, ask questions, and integrate AI-powered answers directly into their developer portal.。来源: https://github.com/drodil/backstage-plugin-qeta

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Internal Q&A and knowledge base for Backstage. Empower teams to share knowledge, ask questions, and integrate AI-powered answers directly into their developer portal.

来源: https://github.com/drodil/backstage-plugin-qeta
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 108

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- **Q&A Platform**: Ask questions, provide answers, and comment on discussions.
- **Knowledge Base**: Write and publish articles for longer-form content.
- **Organization**: Use tags and collections to organize content effectively.
- **Social Features**: Vote on content, mark favorites, and follow users or tags.
- **Gamification**: View statistics and top contributors (users, specific entities).
- **AI Integration**: Optional integration with AI models to assist in answering questions.
- **Entity Integration**: Link questions to specific components or resources in your catalog.
- **Notificatio
